original: Johannesson, Nils Gösta, fil. dr, Göteborg, f. 19/10/13 i Hälsingborg av Oscar J. o. Betty Bengtsson. G. 41 m. Anna-Lisa Rahl. Barn: Nils f. 44, Lars 46. — Stud:ex. i Hälsingb. 31’, fil. miaig. i Lomd 36, fil. lic. 42, disp. i Lund 47, provår v. Hvitfeldt-ska h. a. 1. i Gbg 42-43. Res. t. Danm. 39 o. 46. E. adj. samt timlär. i Karlskrona o. Landskrona, vik. ämneslär. v. Gbgs h. samsk. 431-44, ord. ämn^eslär. där 44’-47, aidj. i modlersm. o. hist. m. samh :-lära v. ’h. alto. lä rov. i Major na i Gbg sed. 47. Sikr.: Den ’sikånska kyrkan o. reformationen (aik. avh. 47), Hur tillkom »krönikan» om. gråbröd, bortjagande ur Danm.? (Kirkeihisft. Sami. 6 R. VI B.).
translated:
Johannesson, Nils Gösta, PhD, Gothenburg, b. 19/10/13 in Hälsingborg to Oscar J. and Betty Bengtsson. Married in 1941 to Anna-Lisa Rahl. Children: Nils b. 1944, Lars b. 1946. 
Education: High School Diploma in Hälsingborg in 1931, Bachelor of Arts in Lund in 1936, Master of Arts in 1942, dissertation defense in Lund in 1947, probationary year at Hvitfeldt'ska high school in Gothenburg in 1942-1943. 
Travels: To Denmark in 1939 and 1946. 
Employment: Assistant and hourly teacher in Karlskrona and Landskrona, temporary subject teacher at Gothenburg's private secondary school from 1943-1944, regular subject teacher there from 1944-1947, adjunct in modern languages and history with social studies at Hvitfeldt'ska high school in Gothenburg since 1947. 
Research: The Scanian Church and the Reformation (doctoral thesis in 1947), How did the "chronicle" about the expulsion of the Greyfriars from Denmark come about? (Church History Journal, Vol. 6, Part VI B).

education.dissertation: The Scanian Church and the Reformation

research.name: The Scanian Church and the Reformation
How did the "chronicle" about the expulsion of the Greyfriars from Denmark come about?
